# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-patterns

# GitHub SHAs
\bapi.github\.com/repos/[^/]+/[^/]+/[^/]+/[0-9a-f]+\b
(?:\[[0-9a-f]+\]\(https:/|)/(?:www\.|)github\.com/[^/]+/[^/]+(?:/[^/]+/[0-9a-f]+(?:[-0-9a-zA-Z/#.]*|)\b|)
\bgithub\.com/[^/]+/[^/]+[@#][0-9a-f]+\b
# githubusercontent
/[-a-z0-9]+\.githubusercontent\.com/[-a-zA-Z0-9?&=_\/.]*
# gist github
/gist\.github\.com/[^/]+/[0-9a-f]+
# git.io
\bgit\.io/[0-9a-zA-Z]+
# GitHub JSON
"node_id": "[-a-zA-Z=;:/0-9+]*"
# Contributor
\[[^\]]+]\(https://github\.com/[^/]+\)
# GHSA
GHSA(?:-[0-9a-z]{4}){3}

x-amz-request-id:[0-9A-F]+
x-amz-id-2:[-a-zA-Z=;:/0-9+]*

# mailbox
/mailboxes/[0-9a-f]+(?:/[0-9a-f]+|/idx/bundle\.[0-9a-f]+\.[0-9a-f]+|)

# {SCHEME}doveadm_password
\`\`\{[^} ]+\}[^`]+\`
\{[^} ]+\}\S+
\`\`echo [^|`]+\|base64 -d
([`'])\$[^`']+\g{-1}
/(?:keys|shared|priv)/[-\w/.]*

# URL escaped characters
\%[0-9A-F]{2}

# uuid:
\b[0-9a-fA-F]{8}-(?:[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-){3}[0-9a-fA-F]{12}\b

# URL escaped characters
\%[0-9A-F]{2}
\%[0-9a-f]{2}

# hex digits including css/html color classes:
(?:[\\0][xX]|\\u|[uU]\+|#x?|\%23)[0-9a-fA-FgGrR_]{2,}(?:[uU]?[lL]{0,2}|u\d+)\b

# Compiler flags
[\t "'`=]-[W]

# tar arguments
\b(?:\\n|)tar(?:\s+-[a-zA-Z]+|\s[a-z]+)+

# <word>v#
[Vv]\d+(?:\b|(?=[a-zA-Z_]))

# ignore long runs of a single character:
\b([A-Za-z])\g{-1}{3,}\b

# dovecot specific ones
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
BBAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAB

8aad0f0a30169f4bea620000ca356bad
